sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Features() { return (

Features You'll Love

Free to Use

StreamSync is completely free to use with your friends. Create unlimited watch parties with no hidden fees.

Secure & Private

Your watch sessions are private and secure. We don't store any of your viewing data or personal information.

Cloud Sync

Your watchlist and preferences are synced across all your devices. Start on your laptop and continue on your phone.

Live Chat

Chat with your friends in real-time while watching. Share reactions, comments, and theories without interrupting the show.

); } export default Features;
